name: DataExplorers
overview:
Data Explorers is the leading global provider of securities financing data and daily long and short institutional fund flow insight.

Based in New York and London, the companyâ€™s analytics help clients identify investment opportunities and manage risk by analyzing fund flow, stock loan availability, short interest and stock lending volume.

Established in 2002, Data Explorersâ€™ unique content set of more than three million daily transactions is sourced directly from contributing customers across securities financing, including Investment Banks, Prime Brokers, Lending Agents, Beneficial Owners and Hedge Funds.
